price: እነርሱ ዘንድ ባለው ነገር ዕውቀቱ የከበበና ነገሩንም ሁሉ በቁጥር ያጠቃለለ ሲኾን የጌታቸውን መልክቶች ያደረሱ መኾናቸውን ያውቅ ዘንድ (ጠባቂ ያደርጋል)፡፡
arabic: لِّيَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ أَبۡلَغُواْ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ وَأَحۡصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عَدَدَۢا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: liyaʿlama an qad ablaghū risālāti rabbihim wa-aḥāṭa bimā ladayhim wa-aḥṣā kulla shayin ʿadadan
